AboutMe:
My name is Knut Holt. I have an university education withing the fields biology, chemistry and physics.

I work as an independent business consultant and internet based marketer with a special interest in the health and fitness fields. I have my own web-sites and I am my own webmaster.

Before that, I have worked as a consultant for several business branches, like: electrical supply, post and communication, information technology and health.

I also have an interest for all types of strange fenomenons and have investigation of such fenomenons as a hobby. Apart from this, I have interest in languages, both general linguistics and specific languages.

My main compentancy in this field is the Romance languages.

I like to write articles about health, fitness, science and other subjects of interest, and I have got as as much as 70 articles punlshed in reputed sites until now.
